remarks: The sign is a homomorphism from the finitary permutation group to the numeric signs.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnghm.s $e |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnghm.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgnghm.f $e |- F = ( S |`s dom N ) $.
psgnghm.u $e |- U = ( ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) |`s { 1 , -u 1 } ) $.
psgnghm $p |- ( D e. V -> N e. ( F GrpHom U ) ) $.
